Uses of Class
gui.view.GameScene

Packages that use GameScene
Package Description
gameboard.objects
This package deals with all the objects, with which you can move over the gameboard and which are needed to play this game.
gameboard.tiles
this package deals with the single tiles and their properties / functionalities on the gameboard
gui.controller
This package contains the controller classes like SceneController and MovingObjectController.
simulator
This package contains the classes to start and store the main information of the game.

  • Uses of GameScene in gameboard.objects

    Methods in gameboard.objects with parameters of type GameScene
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Machine.lowPetrolLevel​(int tank, GameScene gameScene)
    This method is used when driving around and lowering the petrol tank.
    void MovingObject.moveDown​(GameScene gameScene)
    This method represents the functionality of each object to move down.
    void MovingObject.moveLeft​(GameScene gameScene)
    This method represents the functionality of each object to move left.
    void MovingObject.moveRight​(GameScene gameScene)
    This method represents the functionality of each object to move right.
    void MovingObject.moveUp​(GameScene gameScene)
    This method represents the functionality of each object to move up.

  • Uses of GameScene in gameboard.tiles

    Methods in gameboard.tiles with parameters of type GameScene
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void FieldTile.buyField​(GameValue gameValue, GameScene gameScene)
    This method represents the functionality of the farmer to buy additional fields to the first field in the course of the game.

  • Uses of GameScene in gui.controller

    Fields in gui.controller declared as GameScene
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private GameScene MovingObjectController.GAME_SCENE
    the actual GAME_SCENE object that has been created in the method createNewGame() or reloadGame() in the class Game
    private GameScene MovingObjectFunctionalityController.GAME_SCENE
    the actual GameScene object that has been created in the method createNewGame() or reloadGame() in the class Game
    Methods in gui.controller with parameters of type GameScene
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void MovingObjectFunctionalityController.buyField​(GameValue gameValue, GameScene gameScene, FieldTile fieldTile)
    This method implements the functionality to buy a field at the courtTrade.
    void SavingController.createFunctionality​(GameScene gameScene, GameValue gameValue, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Harvester harvester, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill, FieldTile fieldTile, Silo silo, LevelOfDifficulty levelOfDifficulty, CourtTrade courtTrade, MovingObject movingObject)
    This method implements the functionality of the save and end button.
    void GameController.initGameLoop​(GameScene gameScene, FieldTile fieldTile, GameValue gameValue, MovingObjectController movingObjectController)
    This method implements the timer and with every 100 milliseconds it calls the methods moveObject(), proofAction(), and proofFieldAction() from the class movingObjectController.
    private void GameController.proofFieldCounter​(GameScene gameScene, FieldTile fieldTile)
    This method proofs, if the state of growth of all three fields.
    Constructors in gui.controller with parameters of type GameScene
    Constructor Description
    MovingObjectController​(GameScene gameScene, MovingObject movingObject, GameController gameController, GameValue gameValue, Farmer farmer, Tractor tractor, Harvester harvester, Cultivator cultivator, DumpTruck dumpTruck, SeedDrill seedDrill, FieldTile fieldTile, Silo silo, CourtTrade courtTrade)
    Constructor of the class MovingObjectController that initializes some objects and by calling the method initializeFunctionaliy() an object of the class MovingObjectFunctionalityController to make some actions possible.
    MovingObjectFunctionalityController​(GameScene gameScene)
    Constructor that initializes the variables of this class.

  • Uses of GameScene in simulator

    Methods in simulator that return GameScene
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    GameScene Game.createNewGame​(int lod)
    This method deals with starting a new game, the param Level Of Difficulty has to be transferred.
    GameScene Game.reloadGame()
    This method represents the functionality to reload the game after saving and restarting it.
    Methods in simulator with parameters of type GameScene
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void Game.fillInformationFields​(GameScene gameScene, Silo silo, Harvester harvester, Tractor tractor, GameValue gameValue)
    This method fills the text fields of the informationBox of the gameScene with the starting values of the game.
